page.title: 17Highworth Family Life.
page.content: The population of Highworth is around 10,000. We questionned 30 adults in the High Street and many children in our school. The answers we got told us of peoples' lives in Highworth. Most people get up between 7am and 8am and do not have a cooked breakfast. Many sporting activities occur at weekends; most people who play sport enjoy swimming especially. The average person watches between 4 and 5 hours of television a day at the weekend. Children watch the most by far. Most adults go to bed at around 11.30pm, but children end their day at 9.30pm.
